Logarithms of the Folding Degree (lnFD)

This index constitutes a novel parameter proposed by our group to measure the compactness of a protein structure. The definition of this index for a particular residue is as follow:

Where dij is the topological distance between i and j residue, x takes value 1 for both terminal residues and 2 for the rest.
